originalText.text: Karen is an exceptional coach. I really appreciated how she helped to center our coaching plan on what I wanted to accomplish at this point in my career, which drives focus on ensuring that we were strategically tackling those areas of development. She complimented her sessions with supplemental items like articles, assessments, and exercises that would help me further lean in to the tactics discussed and served to reinforce what I learned.

originalText.text:
I considered the offerings of several career coaches before I decided to go with Karen, and I'm so glad I chose 3 Dots Coaching. I appreciated Karen's approach to coaching on several levels, particularly how their lived experience as a neurodivergent person informs their way of working with clients. It was really important to me that I worked with a career coach that understood neurodivergence, as I recently secured a diagnosis for ADHD and wanted to work with someone that could offer guidance on how I could best navigate the professional world as a neurodivergent person.

I also felt very strongly about seeking coaching that went beyond simple resume/LinkedIn reviews; I wanted aid in the discovery and formation of my professional goals. This was a perfect match for Karen's approach, which is deeply grounded in the exploration of a client's values, strengths, and interests. As a result, Karen was an important shepherd in that journey for me, and I walked away from my time with them equipped with a better understanding of myself and what I wanted from my professional life.

I came to career coaching with strong ideas of personal and professional weaknesses I wanted to "fix," but good coaches will give you what you need, not just what you want... and what I needed was a little support, accountability, and nurturance to come into myself and my interests. Karen merges the practical offerings of career coaching (tips for job searching, interviews, applications, etc.) with thoughtful explorative work, resulting in a holistic coaching service that considers the full complexity of its clients to maximize positive impact. The return on my investment has been huge, and I expect Karen's guidance will pay dividends for a long time.

originalText.text: Karen asks questions that make you think. During my coaching session with her, I was able to dig into core beliefs and make (happy) surprising breakthroughs. I would highly recommend Karen to anyone in search of a caring, invested coach!

text.text: Karen asks questions that make you think. During my coaching session with her, I was able to dig into core beliefs and make (happy) surprising breakthroughs. I would highly recommend Karen to anyone in search of a caring, invested coach!

originalText.text: I was mentored by Karen at a time when I was considering some career/life transitions and can truly say that I found great value in our sessions. She posed questions that enabled me to reflect on my values and priorities with a focus on alignment, and offered supplemental material to support the same. Thank you for your time/energy Karen, and I wish you the best!

originalText.text: Karen is a phenomenal coach and asks very thoughtful questions. I found our sessions to be extremely transformative and highly recommend her services.
